(Simplified: 赆)
Chinese Definition:
①臨別時贈送給遠行人的路費、禮物：贐道。贐儀。贐行。
②進貢的財物：納贐。

贐字的基本解释

贐
jìn
见“赆”。

贐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《集韻》徐刃切，去稕，邪。］
亦作“賮1”。“赆1”的繁体字。
(1)送行时赠送的财物。
(2)进贡的财物。
(3)泛指财货。
(4)古代指会面时赠送的礼物。
(5)奉献，赠送。

贐字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　贐； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1212第36
【集韻】徐刃切，音燼。與賮同。【孟子】行者必以贐。【趙岐註】贐，送行者贈賄之禮也。

jìn
See "赆".
Good
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Jiyun" cuts with a blade, to get rid of it, evil. ]
Also known as "賮1". "赆1" in traditional characters.
(1) The property presented as a gift.
(2) The tribute property.
(3) Refers generally to goods.
(4) In ancient times, it refers to a gift given at a meeting.
(5) Dedication, gift.
Good
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　赆; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1212 Page 36
[Ji Yun] Xu Blade cuts, Yin Jin. Same as 賮. 【Mencius】Professionals must be honored. [Zhao Qi's Note] It is a gift for the offender to give bribes.
Good
